reporter-output.line:
T Given user opens ajio application
T Then user should gets ajio homepage
P Home Page verification Expected: a string containing "Online Shopping for Men: Clothes, Shoes, Tech & more - AJIO" Actual: was "Online Shopping for Men: Clothes, Shoes, Tech & more - AJIO" [View Screenshot]
T When user selects 'MEN' in the menu bar
T And user selects 'Shirts' from the menu
T And user selects sort by 'Price (lowest first)'
T Then user should gets search result page
P verifying the products Expected: a value greater than <0> Actual: <45> was greater than <0> [View Screenshot]
T And user verifies the product list is sorted or not
T When user selects the product by index '1'
T Then user should gets the product details page
P Expected: a string containing "NETWORK" Actual: was "NETWORK" [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "FIL-A-FIL SHIRT WITH PATCH POCKET" Actual: was "FIL-A-FIL SHIRT WITH PATCH POCKET" [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "RS. 300" Actual: was "RS. 300" [View Screenshot]
T When user selects the size
T And user clicks on Add to cart link
T Then the product should be added to the cart [View Screenshot]
P Verifying add to cart page Expected: a string containing "Your Shopping Bag | AJIO" Actual: was "Your Shopping Bag | AJIO" [View Screenshot]
P Expected: a string containing "Fil-a-Fil Shirt with Patch Pocket" Actual: was "NETWORK - Fil-a-Fil Shirt with Patch Pocket" [View Screenshot]
F Expected: a string containing "Rs. 300" Actual: was "" [View Screenshot]
